CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: <bef> CHI spots boxes on table and moves towards them
CHI turns around to look at MOT and then turns back to boxes
CHI reaches for boxes on table
MOT takes box down from the table and brings to center of room
MOT starts to open box but then closes it
MOT slides box in front of CHI
MOT looks at book in box
CHI takes book out of box
CHI stares at back cover of book
MOT turns book around and shows CHI the front cover
CHI points to book cover with her fingers
MOT pats her knees with her hands
MOT positions CHI on her lap
MOT hold the book in front of CHI on her lap and points to another character on the cover
MOT points to the character on the page
CHI points with both hands to the two sets of arms
CHI points to the character more forcefully
MOT bends her head to put her face closer to CHI's face

CHAT.comment: at this point the audio quality diminishes and the voices of the Investigators outside the room become noticeable

MOT points to another part of the page
MOT points to another part of the page

MOT points to opposite page again
MOT points to opposite page again

CHI is looking attentively at book while MOT reads to her

<aft> MOT turns back to first page of book
CHI grabs hold of book MOT has been holding in front of her
MOT looks at first page again and begins to read to CHI
CHI begins to turn pages rapidly until she has reached the last page and then closes the book
CHI gets up off of MOT's lap then walks over with book in her hand to empty box on floor
CHI attempts unsuccessfully to put on cover
MOT helps CHI put the cover on

MOT holds closed box out to CHI
CHI turns back to MOT and takes box from her
MOT gets up off the floor
MOT takes box from CHI and puts it on the table
MOT takes box number two down from the table
MOT and CHI partially out of camera view
CHI drops box to the floor where cover falls off . CHI takes Cookie_Monster puppet out of box
CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet on her left hand
MOT sits on floor and watches CHI
MOT looks down at parrot puppet she has in her hand
<aft> MOT slips parrot puppet on her hand
MOT lifts up in front of CHI her hand with the puppet on it
CHI leans over and taps parrot puppet on the head
MOT is smiling and turns the puppet to face toward herself
MOT has puppet open and close his mouth as if talking
< .3> MOT turns puppet around to face herself and then stares at it
MOT looks down at parrot puppet on her hand
MOT examines parrot puppet with her free hand
MOT examines appendages on parrot puppet
MOT animates parrot puppet in a horizontal flying motion
MOT holds puppet up toward CHI
MOT is looking intently at CHI
CHI begins to answer in affirmative and slides into negative response in the same utterance

CHI walks backward away from MOT

unclear which puppet the CHI identifies as male and which one she identifies as female

with beck of the parrot puppet MOT has on her hand she grabs Cookie_Monster puppet from CHI
CHI twists around in circle restlessly
